attributes.action: recognize the events of 1917(In Eastern Turkey) as a act of genocide comitted by Armenians against Turks
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: During the First World War a estimated 300'000 Turks were massacred in North Eastern Turkey.These events were carried out by bands of irregular Armenian troops,under the guidance of the Russian Army.These events occured during 1917 in the months prior to the Russian Revoulution.
